page.title: 05A MOTHER IN BURROUGH
page.content: I AM A MARRIED MOTHER WITH TWO CHILDREN.WE LIVE IN A CONVERTED BARN AND HAVE ALL THE MODERN APPLKIANCES WHICH MAKE EVERY DAY LIFE EASIER.MANY PEOPLE MIGHT FIND LIVING IN SUCH A SMALL VILLAGE LONELY BUT PEOPLE ARE VERY FREINDLY.MAYBE EVERYONE MAKES THAT EXTRA EFFORT.WE HAVE TWO VEHICLES,ONE FOR ME AND THE OTHER FOR MY HUSBANDS BUISNESS.THE BUS SERVICE IS NOT VERY REGULAR AND IS EXPENSIVE.I SPEND MY DAY AT HOME WITH MY YOUNGEST CHILD AS MY ELDEST GOES TO SCHOOL.THERE ALWAYS SEEM PLENTY TO DO,HOUSE TO CLEAN,CLOTHES TO WASH AND IRON,GARDENING,KNITTING AND SEWING.I CAN TAKE MY YOUNGEST SWIMMING, SHOPPING OR JUST GO FOR A WALK.
